FuncDef: The reset access traffic-policy statistics command clears ACL statistics of a user policy based on a user ID.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a user ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Examples: Info: Reset successfully in the slot 8.
ExtraInfo: Before you collect statistics on an interface within a certain period, clear the existing statistics on this interface. To clear ACL statistics of a user policy based on a user ID, run the reset access traffic-policy command.
